---
id: post-pix-refund-close-v-2
title: "Close Refund request"
description: "Close Refund request. The request can only be closed by the contested participant."
sidebar_label: "Close Refund request"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"

proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Close Refund request"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/pix/dict/refund/{refundId}/close"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Close Refund request. The request can only be closed by the contested participant.

For closing, the status must be `OPEN`.

**Idempotence**

The operation is idempotent. If the request has already been closed with the same parameters, a response equivalent to the first request will be returned.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"examples":{"RefundIdentifier":{"value":"91d65e98-97c0-4b0f-b577-73625da1f9fc"}},"name":"refundId","description":"Refund Identifier.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for PixInfractionCloseReportRequest","description":"","required":["refundAnalysisResult"],"type":"object","properties":{"refundAnalysisResult":{"description":"Result of the analysis of the request for refund by the respondent.","enum":["TOTALLY_ACCEPTED","PARTIALLY_ACCEPTED","REJECTED"],"type":"string"},"refundAnalysisDetails":{"description":"Details of the refund request analysis indicating the motivation of the result.","maximum":2000,"type":"string"},"refundRejectionReason":{"description":"Reason for rejecting the refund request.","enum":["NO_BALANCE","ACCOUNT_CLOSURE","INVALID_REQUEST","OTHER"],"type":"string"},"refundTransactionId":{"description":"Refund transaction (full or partial)","pattern":"\\w{32}","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
